title: Upcoming series Rationing Health
byline: Lisa Mullins, Bob Ferrante, David Baron
teaser: PRI's The World takes a global look at the controversial issue of rationing healthcare with four perspectives from four countries. Series editor David Baron explains.
contentencoded: As medical costs rise and budgets tighten, some fear the United States will be forced to ration health care. PRI's The World takes a global look at the controversial issue with four perspectives from four countries. Series editor David Baron explains.
